snippet.title: The Great Geometric Multiverse Tour - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
ADD TO YOUR STEAM WISH LIST NOW:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/887400

The Great Geometric Multiverse Tour is a fast paced, FPS with heavy randomization of all elements, such as weapons, enemies, upgrades/downgrades, and level order.

The GGMT is being developed by Pie On A Plate Productions and is set to release August 27th, 2018.

Stay updated at:
https://PieOnAPlateProductions.com

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/PieOnAPlate

Like us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/PieOnAPlateProductions/

Subscribe to the official PPP subreddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/PieOnAPlateProduct/
